Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities

Interface Bounded

All Superinterfaces:
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, GameNode
All Known Subinterfaces:
BufferedMovable, Collided, Collider, Movable, Newtonian, Placeable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, CompositeEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface Bounded extends com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.DimensionsProvider, GameNode
Implementing this interface exposes the getBoundingBox() and method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default javafx.geometry.Bounds
    getBoundingBox()
    Return the Bounds (Bounding Box) within the YaegerScene after all transformations have been applied.
    default double
    getHeight()
    Return the height.
    default double
    getWidth()

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.GameNode

    getNode

  • Method Details

    • getBoundingBox

      default javafx.geometry.Bounds getBoundingBox()
      Return the Bounds (Bounding Box) within the YaegerScene after all transformations have been applied. This method treats each Node as if it was part of the Scene. In the case of a CompositeEntity the Node will be part of a Group, meaning we get the Bounds within that Group and not the Scene.
      Returns:
      the Bounds
